name: Ackee
description: Self-hosted, Node.js based analytics tool for those who care about privacy

ACKEE_USERNAME.description: Username which will be used to log in to Ackee

ACKEE_PASSWORD.description: Password which will be used to log in to Ackee

ACKEE_MONGODB.description: MongoDB URI which will be used to connect a database to Ackee

ACKEE_ALLOW_ORIGIN.description: Tracked domains which will be used on Ackee (CORS headers)

ACKEE_TTL.description: Specifies how long an Ackee TTL token is valid (Default: 3600000)

ACKEE_TRACKER.description: Specifies a custom name for the tracking script (Default: tracker.js)

ACKEE_ANONYMOUS.description: When set to true, allows users to view the Ackee UI without a username and password
